Source code for dashboard.admin

# from django.contrib import admin
from django.contrib.gis import admin
from django.contrib.gis.admin import OSMGeoAdmin

from . models import ADM3DATA, ADM2DATA, ADMN1DATA, CropCalenders


# Register your models here.


[docs]class ADMN1Admin(OSMGeoAdmin):
    list_display = ('county_name', 'county_code')
    search_fields = ('county_name__startswith', )




[docs]class ADMN2Admin(OSMGeoAdmin):
    list_display = ('sub_county_name', 'county_name')
    search_fields = ('sub_county_name__startswith', )




[docs]class ADMN3Admin(OSMGeoAdmin):
    list_display = ('ward_name', 'sub_county_name',
                    'county_name')
    search_fields = ('ward_name__startswith', )




[docs]class CropCalenderAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    list_display = ('country_name', 'crop', 'stage', 'startDate', 'endDate')
    search_fields = ('country_name__startswith', )



admin.site.register(ADMN1DATA, ADMN1Admin)
admin.site.register(ADM2DATA, ADMN2Admin)
admin.site.register(ADM3DATA, ADMN3Admin)
admin.site.register(CropCalenders, CropCalenderAdmin)
